document_data.name: Nerval Watchwill
document_data.mainbody: '''Nerval Watchwill''' was the High Priest of the temple of [[Tyr]] in [[Ashabenford]] around [[1372 DR]]. He spent his time aiding the [[Riders]] in their defense against the [[drow]] of [[Cormanthor]].
document_data.Personality: Nerval was known for being wary and distrustful of adventurers.
